channel.title: Comments on: Athens – Day 1 – My Flight Was One Hour Early. The Metro Is Broken. Still Made It
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: You're right :D But they really do call it Greek Salad in most places. Others call it Traditional Salad.
item.content:encoded:
You’re right :D
But they really do call it Greek Salad in most places. Others call it Traditional Salad.

item.title: By: Shaul
item.dc:creator: Shaul
item.description: Should a Greek Salad be called a "Greek Salad" in Greece? Shouldn't it just be called a "Salad"?
item.content:encoded: Should a Greek Salad be called a “Greek Salad” in Greece? Shouldn’t it just be called a “Salad”?
